preface.para: These stylesheets are the third iteration of stylesheets for DocBook that I’ve written. I started working on the XSLT 1.0 Stylesheets for DocBook in the 90’s, before XSLT 1.0 was even a W3C Recommendation. I started working on the XSLT 2.0 Stylesheets for DocBook just around the time when XSLT 2.0 became a W3C Recommendation. I wrote most of DocBook xslTNG just a month or so before the third anniversary of the XSLT 3.0 Recommendation.
Why did it take so long?
